activities:
Information Governance Solutions, LLC collects and processes a client’s personal information for the following purposes: 
- Providing a client with services regarding information governance such as records retention schedule creation and updates and records management consulting 
- Customer support and Technical support
- Providing education to professionals in the field of information governance
- Performing marketing activities and communicating information regarding Information Governance Solutions, LLC and its services
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
personaldata: Organization Data - no manually processed data
recoursemech: Information Governance Solutions, LLC will provide standard forms that allow the individual recourse in the event of disputes or disagreement and will dutifully work to honor the request of each individual regarding their data. Unresolved complaints will be referred to EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) and will furthermore ensure compliance with local international laws as applicable. Information Governance Solutions, LLC affirms its commitment to cooperate with EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss FDPIC or their authorized representatives. In addition, our self-assessment efforts are enforceable under the FTC or similar statute.
